00023 class DataItem;

00029 /* NOTE: No writing is possible on a FilterProvider. Use <em>GetChildRow</em> to get
00030 the row of the child provider and update the child provider directly.
00031 See also: <em>Provider, DataItem, FilterRule</em>.*/
00032 class FilterProvider : public AbstractDelegationProvider
00033 {
00034     public:
00035         typedef AbstractDelegationProvider Base;
00036 
00039         FilterProvider();
00040 
00046         FilterProvider(Provider * provider, FilterRule * rule, INT columnid = 0, BOOLEAN negation = FALSE);
00047 
00049         virtual ~FilterProvider();
00050 
00052         void Init(Provider * provider, FilterRule * rule, INT columnid = 0, BOOLEAN negation = FALSE);
00053 
00055         void SetNegation(BOOLEAN negation) { m_negation = negation; }
00056 
00058         void SetFilterColumn(INT filtercolumn) { m_column = filtercolumn; }
00059 
00061         void SetFilterRule(FilterRule * rule) { m_rule = rule; }
00062 
00064         virtual INT RowCount();
00065 
00067         virtual BOOLEAN GetDataItem(INT column, INT row, DataItem & item);
00068 
00070         virtual BOOLEAN InsertRow(INT row);
00071 
00074         virtual BOOLEAN DeleteAllRows(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00075 
00077         virtual BOOLEAN Update(ProviderListener * listener = 0);
00078 
00080         virtual BOOLEAN GetChildRow(INT & childrow, INT row);
00081 
00083         virtual BOOLEAN SetParameter(const DataItem &item);
00084 
00087         virtual void OnExecutingListener(Provider* provider = 0);
00088         
00089     protected:
00095         virtual BOOLEAN IsRowFiltered(Provider* base_provider, INT row, BOOLEAN negate);
00096 
00097         virtual void OnChildProviderModification(Provider* provider, const Provider::Modification &modification);
00098 
00099     private:
00100         virtual BOOLEAN UpdateIndexTable(ModificationType type, INT row);
00101 
00102         virtual INT FindFilteredRow(INT child_row);
00103 
00104         BOOLEAN      m_negation;
00105         INT          m_FilteredCnt;
00106         INT          m_column;
00107         FilterRule * m_rule;
00108 
00109         IndexTable<INT> m_FilteredRows;
00110 };
